{"id":1337584023,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1722275401,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1337584023/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"12.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        map<char, int> mp;\n        int maxm = 0; \n        int prev = -1; \n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {\n            if (mp.count(s[i]) != 0) {\n                \n                prev = max(prev, mp[s[i]]);\n            }\n\n            mp[s[i]] = i;\n\n            maxm = max(maxm, i - prev);\n        }\n        \n        return maxm;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
